comments.snippet: Triage refresh (P2): this issue has been inactive for a long time. Please retest on the latest build and share reproducible steps, expected vs actual behavior, and logs/screenshots. If there is no confirmation/update, maintainers can close it as stale or not reproducible.

notes:
AI triage (gemini): Added 'Open in Browser' functionality for HTTP/HTTPS connections, a logical and common enhancement.
Approach: Added a new 'Open in Browser' menu item to the connection context menu. This item is enabled only for HTTP/HTTPS connections and, when clicked, opens the connection's URL in the default browser.
